application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: A4D Storage and distribution to residential

decision_conditions: <p><b style="font-weight:normal;" id="docs-internal-guid-79991b28-7fff-b4cc-78c4-8ba8d32549c4"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">This permission shall expire after a period of two years from the date of this decision.</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON:&nbsp; In order that the Local Planning Authority can review any change in circumstances after this period and to avoid the accumulation of unimplemented permissions.</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The tree works hereby approved shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the description on this notice of approval by a suitable qualified tree surgeon and in accordance with BS3998:2010 Recommendations for tree works (or any standard that reproduces or replaces this standard).&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON:&nbsp; In the interests of visual amenity and good arboricultural practice, having regard to Policy LP51 in the Local Plan 2033 (adopted 2020).</span></p>
description:
T1 - Platanus - Pollard back to most recent points - not beyond
T2 - Platanus - Reduce reshape by 2- 3 m from branch ends to manage size and shape and for continuity with other plane trees on site. Lift
over road to 4.5m
T3 - Platanus - Pollard back to most recent points - not beyond
T4 - Platanus - Pollard back to most recent points - not beyond
T5 - Platanus - Pollard back to most recent points - not beyond
